channel.title: A-rank reaper missions?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "A-rank reaper missions?"

item.title: Re: A-rank reaper missions?
item.content:encoded: Yes, you have to be a Jonin to get A-rank missions.

item.title: A-rank reaper missions?
item.content:encoded:
hey,

i've been following the reaper guide and i'm at the point where i have to get hermano and tha quincy dude (i forgot his name in BvS) but i don't get any A-Rank reaper missions… i don;t know what i missed i did all the special missions and stuff… the only thing i can imagine is that i might have to be a jonin to get those? i'm still a sp. jonin … anyone know if i have to be a jonin in order to get those?

mfg
Thark
